quotes.quote: Here is the treasure chest of the world - the public library, or a bookstore.
The quality of the content is not determined by the section it sits in in the bookstore.
A place is not really a place without a bookstore.
I wanted a bookstore because the book business is the business of life.
Standing there, staring at the long shelves crammed with books, I felt myself relax and was suddenly at peace.
A bookstore is one of the many pieces of evidence we have that people are still thinking.
This is a feminist bookstore. There is no humor section.
Books are the greatest treasure of wisdom and knowledge for mankind.
Desire for books, desire to read.
Lover of books, lover of knowledge.
Read good books to improve yourself.
The bookstore and the coffeehouse are natural allies; Neither has a time limit, slowness is encouraged.
I am fatally attracted to all bookstores.
For someone who is hungry for the wisdom of the past, the smell of books in a bibliopole is more beautiful than the smell of the world's finest dishes!
Profitable bookstores sell books. Unprofitable book sellers store books.
Books … they’re kind of a compulsion for me. To find a great bookstore is a great thing.
We all just took the bookstore at its word, because if you couldn't trust a bookstore, what could you trust?
In a second-hand bookshop head to the back, find the old books with dust undisturbed and worn off covers for these clothe true treasures.
Genre is a bookstore problem, not a literary problem.
A good little bookstore…is a laboratory for our coming together.
I love walking into a bookstore. It's like all my friends are sitting on shelves, waving their pages at me.
A good bookshop is just a genteel Black Hole that knows how to read.
Bookstores always remind me that there are good things in this world.
